subject: RE: [junit] Errors moving to 1.5
msgSnippet: ... I ve heard of a project that just started, is using Java 5 and Junit, and didn t yet encounter any problems. Cheers, Ilja
messageBody:
Metlis, Matthew B. wrote:
> Has anyone else used JUnit with Java 1.5? I am curious
> whether anyone else has, whether you have encountered
> problems or not, and have you used JUnit to test classes that
> use new Java 1.5 features such as parameterization?

I've heard of a project that just started, is using Java 5 and Junit, and
didn't yet encounter any problems.

Cheers, Ilja
